roleset.name: make obscene

example.name: Non-agentive arg 0
example.text: This line in the play smuts the entire act.

roleset.name: stain with a dirty substance

example.name: unconventional dirt
example.text: People that, if they can but have the happiness to be buried in a shroud smutted with this Celestial Fire, it will certainly secure them from the Flames of Hell.

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class fill-9.8. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.
